<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> BUSINESS AVIATION NEWSLETTER January 2019 TICK...TICK...TICK... TIME IS RUNNING OUT Time is ticking away ahead of the deadline for 2020 ADS-B Out mandate compliance. But, Dec. 31, 2019 isn’t the most important date, it’s actually June 2019, or before at several service centers. In most cases, if you don’t have your plane scheduled for upgrades by June, you won’t get in before the deadline...
